nodes.bodyText: I can't remember the details of why this is needed but can try to pull it up again if needed. There are flags set by default when doing getLaunchIntentForPackage and they suppress something, maybe returning a result.
I tested the fix without the flag (not here but using external widgets) and it seems to work so would be good if you could double check it.
Is it just me or are the docs around this particularly bad?
Ok this is confusing but makes more sense now thanks!
getLaunchIntentForPackage() might return null so wee need some null check now I think.
